page.title: 11CHURCHES IN CAREW AREA,TENBY
page.content: { There are 2 churches in the area. The one at{Carew Cheriton}is{Church {of Wales.}On average 40 members attend service on a Sunday morning. In the {Sunday School}there are{3 teachers for {20 children.}The{church}was probably {built in the 14th century}with the {Bristol type tower being completed in {the 15th century.}Recently the church members have had to raise many thousands of pounds to pay for repairs to the tower. { Carew Wesley Methodist Church}is much younger,having been{built in 1852.}The average number of members who attend each service is about 40.An{extra part was{built on in 1883 for the Sunday {School.}There are{4 teachers who teach {about 45 children}every Sunday. The Baptist and United Reform churches lie just outside the 12km. area.
